item.title: Customizing the default splash screen image on an Intel® NUC8
item.description: I have a NUC8i7BEH, which comes by default with some variation of: Figure 1: The default Intel® NUC logo Intel® published a way back the Intel® Integrator Toolkit (or ITT for short) which provides an UEFI executable that can be used to replace the default splash image. Let’s see how. Requirements NUC8 or older The list of compatible devices can be found on the download page of the ITT. A JPEG image with these restrictions: Size At most 60 KB.
